titles.title: Federal Contractor Security Act
Federal Contractor Security Act
To require certain Federal service contractors to participate in a pilot program for employment eligibility confirmation.

bill.summary: Federal Contractor Security Act - Amends the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant Responsibility Act of 1996 to require the following Federal service contractors to participate in a pilot program for employment eligibility confirmation: (1) those contractors required to pay at least minimum wage; and (2) those contractors exempted from the requirements of the Service Contract Act of 1965.
